Module0.title: Data Science Course in Pune with Microsoft certification

desc: Skillslash is providing you with an all-inclusive data science course in Pune with Microsoft certification , a global technology giant. This data science course in Pune not only comes with expert led training , but also gives you added incentives of dual certification, that is, a microsoft certification and real-time work experience certification to add to your resume and give you the much needed push in the data science job field.

Offering data science training in Pune multiple areas of data analytics, machine learning, and statistical analysis. We, at Skillslash provide students with all the skills, models, and insights in this all inclusive data science course in Pune. More so, the data science course in Pune is developed and comes with real-time work experience and guaranteed job referrals which give participants the push to create their data science careers.

Our Data Science Course in Pune gives one an all-inclusive access to a comprehensive course curriculum that includes key data science concepts from python, basic statistics, applied statistics, to advanced learning, deep learning, Power BI, SQL and data science tools with practical applications of the same. Not only that, this data science course in Pune provides an opportunity for you to work within your domain of choice may it be healthcare, finance, or marketing. So, become a data scientist in your own domain through our data science training with domain specialization.

This data science course in Pune is perfect for you irrespective of your level of skills and background, as whether you are a fresher looking to work in data science or an experienced professional looking to transition to a data science career under your own domain.

Module0.title: What is Data Science? Why Become a Data Scientist?

desc: Data science is a subject that revolves around data. It is an area of statistical, mathematical and computer science skills and techniques to help make better decisions using the data available to us.

Data Scientists are simply data science trained personnel who know how to use their knowledge and skills to collect data, organize data, and draw conclusions from the data to help companies  make wise decisions for the betterment of the company.
To become a data scientist in today’s world, is a lottery of an opportunity, this is because:
1. Currently, data science has garnered much attention, and is practiced in almost every organization in multiple fields from finance to healthcare to marketing.

2. There is an influx of data in the present digital world, thus more demand for data science professionals. So, with a strong data science background you will have a wide scope for job opportunities.
3. As a data scientist, you get to work on cool real-time projects and get competitively remunerated for the same as it is a highly competitive market area and data scientists are in high demand.

Thus, having a strong data science knowledge and background is a great advantage today. In terms of creating your career, earning pay and incentives and performing meaningful work in today’s job-oriented environment.

Module0.title: Why Learn Data Science in Pune ?

desc: India which with its huge population has a huge amount of collected data and the need to organize and understand this data, thus a great demand of data science professionals who can perform data analysis.

For a data scientist, Pune is a great city to work in India as the city offers multiple opportunities not just for experienced personnel but also freshers who are starting out their data science career.
Here are some reasons why Pune might be the suitable place for you to practice data science:
1. A large IT sector with multiple organizations, companies and startups looking for data science professionals and providing a competitive payscale.
2. Pune is one of the top cities to study data science and research as it houses top education institutions such as IISER, SVPU, and IIT Pune.
3. The Pune Start-up arena has expanded to wide extents within the last 10 years, providing for further more job opportunities especially for freshers out there.
4. Multiple data science events and forums for data scientists, freshers, professionals to come together and gain and share their knowledge and opportunities.

In summary, the data science environment in Pune has definitely reached great heights with its strong technological center, a diverse flow of talent and a growing start-up arena. All of these reasons and more is why Pune would make for a great place to study and work in the data science field.

Module0.title: Why Choose a Data Science Training Course in Pune ?

desc: Taking up a data science course in Pune is quite beneficial and comes with added advantages. This is because Pune stands to be one of the leading technology and analytics cities in India. Its IT sector and business sector are growing and providing for multiple job opportunities; Plus, the cost of living in Pune is quite reasonable to have a great standard of living on a data scientist pay scale.

Furthermore, the city of Pune has opened its borders to multiple industries from different domains (healthcare, finance, e-commerce, marketing. Communications, and more), this only increases the level of opportunities available to you to create a successful data science career in Pune.

desc: Currently, with the rapidly growing demand for data science and data science professionals ; Recruiters look at candidates and applications with a strong data science background, practical experience and work experience before choosing their data scientists and employees.

Therefore, to create a job opportunity for yourself and advance in your position, you will need to have a strong body of knowledge and expertise to back you. And this is where Skillslash’s Data science course in Pune will help you greatly. Here’s how this data science course in Pune aims to help you in your data science career :

You choose Skillslash’s data science course in Pune because here, you get it all from theory to practical to further aid in jobs and placements. By opting for this course you start off and learn everything about data science that you need to know to survive and succeed in the data science job market. From the basics to the advanced levels everything is curated by experts in the industry and is taught with practical aid and examples to create interactive training sessions.

Module0.title: What are the course program options offered ?

desc: Currently, we offer specialization courses in the advanced data science and AI course and the Business Analytics course for professionals. Both these curriculum courses are made available to you with two Program plans:

1. The Pro Plan: This plan is placed at a cost of IN 65,000 (without GST) gives you a 1 year live class subscription and a 2 year subscription to our Learning Management system dashboard, accompanied with 7+ industry projects and 1 capstone project.

2. The Pro Max Plan:  At a cost of INR 1,20,000 (without GST) comes with job assistance, 4 year live class subscription, lifetime access to our learning dashboard, unlimited job referrals, 15+ industry projects, 3 capstone projects, 2 domain training, 6 months project certification from companies and a microsoft certification.
* Both these plans come with monthly EMI options and scholarship options. *

Module0.title: What are the Job Opportunities after completion of this data science course in Pune ?

desc: Opting for this data science course in Pune and after its successful completion you will be readily equipped to perform a wide range of jobs in domains of your choosing. Here are some of the job positions you can explore after completing the data science course in Pune:
- Data Scientist in Healthcare, Finance, E-commerce, Marketing, Retail, Education, Government, and more.

Module0.title: What are the projects offered under this Data Science Course in Pune ?

desc: This data science course in Pune offers you an opportunity to work on 10+ industry-partnered capstone projects in over 6+ domains, while practicing with 20+ tools.
Our Industry-partnered capstone projects, hands-on projects are created with the aim of providing real world experience, include the following domains and projects :

chap.title: BFSI Domain
desc: 1. Predicting credit default: (Analyze a customer’s financial records, such as credit line number, age, payment history, and past 6 months’ delinquency history to forecast the likelihood of the customer’s default on future payments. )
2. Foreign currency exchange rate prediction:(Predicting foreign currency exchange rates to make informed decisions in international financial transactions. )
3. Predicting dynamic interest rates on loans: (Create a predictive model that allows financial institutions to optimize strategies..)

4. Designing an effective marketing strategy for banks: (You will work to design an effective marketing strategy for banks that enhances customer acquisition, maximizes cross-selling opportunities, to drive sustainable growth and profitability for the institution.)

5. Fraud detection for online/mobile banking services: (You will implement advanced machine learning algorithms and anomaly detection  techniques to identify and prevent fraudulent activities that ensure the trust of customer’s financial transactions. )

chap.title: Healthcare
desc: 1. Heart disease prediction: (You will build a reliable machine learning model for predicting the risks of heart diseases on the basis of patient’s data, to aid early diagnosis and timely medical treatments. )

2. Google Mobility data prediction: ( You will use historial Google mobility data, leveraging machine learning algorithms and statistical models to analyze future mobility patterns for insights into disease trends and behaviors. )

chap.title: Retail & Ecommerce
desc: 1. Recommender Systems :(Here, you learn to enhance customer experience for your organization and further your company’s engagement statistics)
2. Customer Basket Analysis for Marketing campaigns: (You analyze recurring purchases of customers to uncover patterns to enhance strategies and revenue. )
3. Amazon reviews for sentiment analysis:(You learn to categorize amazon reviews using NLP techniques in order to understand customer satisfaction )
4. Retail Sales Prediction: (Using machine learning algorithms to help forecast future sales rates)
And more in HR, Marketing and Commerce fields for you to explore with us at Skillslash through this data science course in Pune.

Module0.title: What is the Scope for Data Scientists in 2023 ?

desc: A study report by the Data Science Recruitment Agency, Nascom and the Social Media Platform, Zynga shows that data science related jobs and job opportunities are only growing in demand as the years pass and quite fast in comparison to the average growth of other fields and occupations.

With its constant predicted growth, the big data analytics and data science market is expected to grow to around $103 billion and more all around the world, and at a steady pace at around 33 percent growth rate in India.

Module0.title: What is the Data Science course in Pune’s course duration ?

desc: The Data Science course in Pune being an online data science training platform lasts between 5 months to 3 years in terms of your access to the course dashboard. This course is designed to be a self-paced learning course thereby you can complete the course at your own pace with no rush while keeping up with your work or other commitments.

Module0.title: Module 0
Module0.descS: Our courses start off with this module that offers a basic overview of programming in data science for both beginners and advanced users who wish to strengthen their fundamental skills.

chap.title: Chapter 1: Introduction to Programming ( 3 hrs )
desc: Source code Vs bytecode Vs machine code, Compiler Vs Interpreter, C/C++, Java Vs Python.

chap.title: Chapter 2: code editors basics (1 hrs)
desc: Different type of code editors in python, Introduction to Anaconda and IDEs

chap.title: Chapter 3: python basics (1 hrs)
desc: Variable Vs Identifiers, Strings Operators Vs Operand, Procedure oriented Vs Modular programming.

chap.title: Chapter 4: statistics basics & probability (1 hrs)
desc: Measures of Central Tendency & dispersion, Inferential statistics and Sampling theory.

Module0.title: Module 1
Module0.descS: Through a hands-on approach, you will learn key programming concepts of Python, MatplotLib, Seaborn and languages commonly used in the data science field. Whether you're aspiring to become a data scientist or simply seeking to harness the power of programming for data analysis, this module equips you with the essential skills to manipulate, analyze, and visualize data effectively.

chap.title: Chapter 2: PYTHON INTRODUCTION (1 hrs)
desc: How a Python Program runs on our system?
Features of Python Memory Management in Python,

chap.title: Chapter 6: EXPECTION HANDELING
desc: Nestedtry-except block & Default except for block.

chap.title: Chapter 7: MODULES IN PYTHON
desc: Importing Modules and different import statement

chap.title: Chapter 8: FILE HANDELING
desc: Why do we need File Handling?

chap.title: Chapter 10: NUMPY IN PYTHON
desc: Intro & use of numpy, What is an array?

chap.title: Chapter 11: PANDAS IN PYTHON
desc: Exporting Dataframe to CSV and Excel

chap.title: Chapter 13: Seaborn
desc: Working with seaborn on titanic dataset

Module0.title: Module 2
Module0.descS: By the end of the module, you will have mastered statistical tools such as probabilistic theory, hypothesis testing and regression analysis, all in the context of practical data science applications and the knowledge they need to be at the forefront of data science and lead data-driven innovations.

chap.title: Chapter 1:- Probability theory and Statistical Inferences ( 4 hrs )
desc: Discrete Probability Distributions - Binomial, Poisson etc
Continuous Probability Distributions - Gaussian, Normal, etc

chap.title: Chapter 2: Statistics Foundations (1 hrs)
desc: Measures of Central tendency and Dispersion
Sampling theory and scales of measurement

chap.title: Chapter 3: Hypothesis Testing and its Applications (1 hrs)
desc: Basic Concepts - Formulation of Hypothesis, Making a decision
Advanced Concepts - Choice of Test - t test vs z test
Evaluation of Test - P value and Critical Value approach

chap.title: Chapter 4: Exploratory Data Analysis and the Art of Storytelling (1 hrs)

Module0.title: Module 3
Module0.descS: Explore cutting-edge algorithms, model optimization, and deep learning architectures, all while gaining practical experience through hands-on projects.

chap.title: Chapter 1:A primer on Machine Learning ( 3 hrs )
desc: Types of Learning - Supervised, Unsupervised and Reinforcement
Types of Analysis - Descriptive, Predictive, and Prescriptive
Bias Variance Tradeoff - Overfitting vs Underfitting

chap.title: Chapter 2: Regression
desc: What is linear in Linear Regression?
Model Evaluation Metrics for regression problems - MAE, RMSE, MSE, and MAP

chap.title: Chapter 3: Classification
desc: Up sampling, Down sampling and SMOTE

chap.title: Chapter 4: Clustering-K means
desc: K Means Algorithms - Partition based model for clustering

chap.title: Chapter 5: KNN
desc: Non-Parametric algorithms and Lazy learning ideology
Applications in Missing value imputes and Balancing datasets

chap.title: Chapter 7: Decision Trees
desc: Why are they called Greedy Algorithms?

chap.title: Chapter 8: Ensemble Techniques
desc: Introduction to Bagging as an Ensemble technique
Bootstrap Aggregation and Out of Bag error
Random Forests and its Applications in Feature selection
How Bagging overcomes the overfitting problem?
How Boosting overcomes the Bias - Variance Tradeoff
Gradient Boosting and Xgboost as regularised boosting

chap.title: Chapter 11: Time-series Analysis
desc: The Random Walk model and Stationarity of Time Series
Tests for Stationarity - ADF and Dickey- Fuller test, AR, MA, ARIMA, SARIMA models
A regression approach to time series forecasting.

chap.title: Chapter 12: Machine Learning Pipeline & auto ML
desc: Serving the model via Rest API & Keras.

Module0.title: Module 4
Module0.descS: Gain the skills and knowledge you need to make the most of deep learning for everything from image recognition to natural language processing and predictive modeling. Get to know the ins and outs of AI, deep learning, CNNs, RNNs, and other cutting-edge techniques.

chap.title: Chapter 3: Deep Neural Networks
desc: Tools for deep learning models - Tflearn and Pytorch
The problem of Exploding and Vanishing gradients

chap.title: Chapter 4: Convolutional Neural networks
desc: Architecture and design of a Convolutional network,

chap.title: Chapter 5: Recurrent Neural networks and LSTMs.
desc: RN N & LSTM structure, Bidirectional RNNs and Applications on Sequential data
Advanced Time series forecasting using RNNs with LSTMs

chap.title: Chapter 6: Restricted Boltzmann Machines and Autoencoders.
desc: Application of RBMs in Collaborative filtering

Module0.title: Module 5
Module0.descS: This module will help you figure out the ins and outs of text data. You'll learn the basics of analyzing, manipulating, and extracting meaning from text, so you can create smart apps, make decisions based on data, and improve your data science abilities.

chap.title: Chapter 1:- Language modelling
desc: N-gram Language models: Perplexity and Smoothing
Introduction to Hidden Markov models, Viterbi algorithms
MEMMs and CRFs for named entity recognition
Application of LSTMs to predict the next word.

chap.title: Chapter 3: Sequence to Sequence tasks
desc: NLP with machine translation for text analysis
How to implement a conversational Chatbot

chap.title: Chapter 4: Capstone Project
desc: backend and  deployment process for chatbot

Module0.title: Module 6
Module0.descS: Discover the exciting world of Reinforcement Learning (RL) in the context of Data Science. In this module, you will delve into the fundamentals of RL, a powerful machine learning paradigm that enables algorithms to make sequential decisions by learning from their interactions with the environment.

desc: The multi-armed bandit problem and the explore-exploit dilemma
Approximation Methods (i.e., how to plug in a deep neural network or other differentiable model into your RL algorithm)

Module0.title: Module 7
Module0.descS: Whether you're interested in object detection, image classification, facial recognition, or the countless other applications of Computer Vision, this module will equip you with the knowledge and skills to tackle real-world data challenges and unlock the potential of visual data in the field of data science.

desc: R-CNN and RetinaNet models for Object detection using Tensorflow
IoU and Dice score for model evaluation

Module0.title: Module 8
Module0.title1: Data Structures and Algorithms ( 12 Weeks ) (only in Pro Max)
Module0.descS: From understanding the significance of data structures to mastering algorithmic problem-solving, this module equips you with the critical skills needed to excel in the field of data science. You will be solving 250+ coding challenges under guidance of expert mentors working in Tier 1 companies like Microsoft, Amazon, Adobe, Facebook, Google etc.

desc: Array basics, Problem solving techniques with example

chap.title: Note
desc: Total Number of problems to be solved in live class: 120+

Module0.title: Module 9
Module0.descS: Unlock the full potential of data science with our comprehensive module on essential tools: Excel, SQL, Tableau, and Power BI and more. Dive into the world of data manipulation, analysis, visualization, and reporting with hands-on training in these industry-standard applications.

chap.title: Chapter 1: Excel Fundamentals
desc: Excel Toolbars: Hiding, Displaying, and Moving Toolbars.
Switching Between Sheets in a Workbook.
Hiding and Unhiding Columns, Rows and Sheets.
Opening, saving and closing Excel document.

chap.title: Chapter 2: Worksheet Customization
desc: Creating Headers, Footers, and Page Numbers.
Adjusting Row Height and Column Width.
Moving and Copying Data in an Excel Worksheet.
Inserting and Deleting Rows and Columns.

chap.title: Chapter 3: Images and Shapes into Excel Worksheet

desc: Entering and selecting values. Using numeric data in excel
Working with forms menu, cell references, conditional
Finding and replacing information from worksheet
Inserting & deleting cells, rows and columns.

chap.title: Chapter 5: Excel Formulae
desc: Im plementing excel formulae in worksheet
Relative vs Absol ute cell references in formulae
Entering and Editing text, Fixing errors in your formulae
Formulae with several operators, Formulae with cell ranges

chap.title: Chapter 6: Excel Functions
desc: Working with functions like SUM(), AVERAGE() etc
Adjacent cells error in excel calculations

chap.title: Chapter 7: Working with Charts and Graphs
desc: Working with the excel chart ribbon.
Adding and modifying data on an Excel chart.
Moving a chart to another worksheet.
Adding titles, gridlines and a data table.
Formatting a data series and chart axis.
Changing a chart type and working with pie charts.

chap.title: Chapter 8: Support Vector Machines
desc: Structuring Source Data for Analysis in Excel
Exploring Pivot Ta ble Analyse & Desig n Options
Working with and on pivot tables
Enriching data with Pivot table calculated values & fields

chap.title: Chapter 9: Basic Macros
desc: Assigning a Macro a Shortcut Key.

chap.title: Chapter 10: Introduction to SQL
desc: All about SQL Difference between SQL & MongoDB.
Different Structured Query languages Why MySQL?

chap.title: Chapter 16: JOINS & Functions
desc: Usage of different types of JOINS
Usage of string functions like; CONCAT, SUBSTRING etc
OUTER join, Full join, Left Join, Right Join, UNION.

chap.title: Chapter 17: Advance SQL
desc: Timestamps and Extract, CURRENT DATE & TIME, EXTRACT
AGE, TO_CHAR, Mathematical Functions and Operators
ROUND, SETSEED, Operators and their precedence.

chap.title: Chapter 19: Mongo DB
desc: What are Object Ids in MongoDb.

chap.title: Chapter 20: Introduction To Tableau
desc: Different charts on TABLEAU (Bar graphs, Line graphs, Scatter graphs, Crosstabs, Histogram, Heatmap, Tree maps, Bullet graphs, etc.)

chap.title: Chapter 21: Data Types in Tableau
desc: Adding a second layer moving average.

chap.title: Chapter 22: Mapping and Analytics
desc: Creating a map, working with hierarchies.
Image Creating a Scatter Plot, Applying Filters to Multiple Worksheets.

chap.title: Chapter 23: Calculations
desc: level of detail common calculation functions

chap.title: Chapter 24: Dashboard and Stories
desc: Working in views with Dashboard and stories

chap.title: Chapter 25: Introducation To Power BI
desc: Understanding the Power BI Desktop Workflow.
Exploring the Interface of the Data Model.

chap.title: Chapter 26: Query Editor
desc: Connecting Power BI Desktop to Source Files.

chap.title: Chapter 27: Power BI
desc: Working with Time series Understanding aggregation and granularity

Review.title: Why should you enrol in our Data Science course?
Review.desc: The  Data Science course from Skillslash includes real-world experience and is tailored for creative minds. Experience the future age of education by enrolling in our Data Science training institutes in Pune.

Fee.desc: The Data science course fees in Pune start from INR 65,000 (Excluding  GST). We aim to deliver to you quality education considering the aspect of feasibility.
Fee.desc1: Skillslash's data science training in Pune are designed giving importance to affordability. The Data Science course fees is feasible to ensure fair reachability. Further, we provide you with options such as EMI to pay the course fees.

AboutCourseHeading.heading: A look into Our Data Science certification course in Pune
AboutCourseHeading.para: Skillslash is providing one of the top data science course in Pune, for you data science wanderers out there. Our professionally selected data science certification course in Pune offers not only the opportunity to acquire data science training in Pune, but also to obtain an accredited and verified microsoft and real-time work experience certification upon completion of the course. This data science training course provides a comprehensive deep learning and practical training experience through a tailored course curriculum that equips participants with the knowledge and skills to master the core concepts of data science through the study and implementation of the Python programming language, Applied Statistics for Business, SQL for Business, Excel for Business and Machine Learning.

data.heading: What is Data Science ? Why become a Data Scientist ?
data.para: Data science is a cross-disciplinary field that uses statistical, math, computer, and domain-related skills to get useful insights and knowledge out of data. Data science professionals use their skills in analyzing data, learning from big data, and visualizing it to make decisions based on what's in the data. They're the ones who turn raw data into useful information that can help businesses create better strategies, streamline processes, and tackle complex issues in different industries. There are lots of great reasons to become a data scientist,
list: Data science is leading the way in the digital revolution and the need for data scientists is growing all the time.
Companies all over the world rely on data to stay ahead of the competition, so there are tons of job opportunities out there.
Plus, data scientists get to work on really cool projects, like predictive modeling, fraud detection, personalized recommendations, and optimizing processes.

It's a really exciting and intellectually stimulating job, perfect for people who like to solve complex problems. Finally, data science has great pay and benefits, so it's a great way to make some extra cash.
data.para1: Basically, data science is all about analyzing data and using machine learning to get useful information out of it. If you want to be part of the big data revolution, become a data scientist, work on cool projects, and have amazing career opportunities. Data is becoming more and more important in decision-making, and data scientists are playing a huge role in changing industries and making a difference in businesses and society.

data.heading: Why Data Science in Pune ?
data.para: Data science is becoming more and more popular all over the world, and it's no different in India. Pune is a great place to work if you're a data scientist, whether you're just starting out or already have a lot of experience. There are a few reasons why Pune is such a data science hub, but here are the most important ones :
list: Pune has a thriving IT sector, with lots of big companies, startups, and tech-savvy firms setting up shop in the city. It's a great place for data science experts to work on innovative projects and work with different teams.

Pune is a great place to study and do research because it's home to some of the top-notch educational and research institutes in the world, like IISER, SVPU, and IIT. These institutions create a great academic atmosphere, which helps draw in the best talent and helps build data science knowledge in the area.

Pune's start-up scene has really taken off in the last 10 years. A lot of tech and analytics start-ups have moved to Pune because of the great business climate, affordability, and access to experienced data scientists.

Pune has a relatively low cost of living compared to other big cities like Pune or Mumbai, which makes it a great choice for data science professionals who want to find the perfect balance between a good job and quality of life.

Pune hosts a ton of data science events on a regular basis. It's a great place for data science nerds to come together and learn, share ideas, and make professional connections. It's a place where people come together and support each other.
data.para1: To sum up, the data science scene in Pune has really taken off thanks to a strong IT sector, a great talent pool, great education institutions, and a great start-up scene. Data science is still driving innovation across different industries, so Pune is in a great spot to help shape the future of this ever-changing field.

data.heading: Why should you take up our data science certification course in Pune ?
data.para: Our Data Science training course in Pune has been developed with meticulous attention to detail by experienced industry professionals and data scientists to provide a comprehensive understanding of the fundamentals and how to apply them in practice. Our course is suitable for individuals of all levels, whether they are new to Data Science or experienced professionals seeking to improve their skills.
data.para1: Our data science training in Pune program offers Microsoft certification and a real time work experience certification, which will be received from leading multinational corporations and start-ups with whom the candidate will collaborate on live industrial projects and gain real-world experience. This real time work experience will not only differentiate the candidate from other applicants, but will also provide them with an advantage in the field of work, as they already possess the necessary work experience to demonstrate to recruiters their superior capabilities in the field.

data.heading: The benefits you will get by enrolling in Skillslash’s data science course in Pune?
data.para: Right now, there's a lot of demand for data science and you're seeing lots of other data science courses in Pune popping up, so you're wondering where to sign up. The answer is to pick Skillslash for your online and offline data science journey and avail the benefits of our best data science course in Pune, Gain high-quality applicable skills in real-time - with us, you’ll learn the skills you’ll need to succeed as a data scientist through our live sessions, customized course curricula and stimulating interviews.
data.para1: Become a Microsoft Certified Data Scientist - After completing a data science course with us you’ll leave with a Microsoft certification. Get Real-time Work Experience Certifications from Top MNC’s/Startups - This certification will give you a competitive edge in the real-world as you'll get to work with real companies on real projects, and when you're done, you'll get a real-time work experience certificate from the company.Learn At Your Own Speed - With 350+ Live Sessions and recorded videos, you can choose to learn at your own comfortable pace.

data.heading: The benefits you will get by enrolling in Skillslash’s data science course in Pune?
data.para: Our key differentiating point, when it comes to providing data science courses, is that,  Skillslash collaborates with a number of multinational corporations (MNCs) and startups. Upon successful completion of our academic training program, participants will receive their own microsoft certification from Skillslash. Additionally, participants will be able to participate in real-world projects with real-world companies, and upon completion of this process, they will receive a real-world proof of work through real-time work experience certificates from the respective company

data.heading: What will one learn during the data science training in Pune with Skillslash?
data.para: Our program provides a comprehensive overview of Data Science, ranging from the fundamentals to advanced levels. Our course curriculum covers a wide range of topics, providing you with the knowledge and skills you need to succeed in this field. Our program includes Python, C/C++, advanced machine learning, deep learning, applied statistics, and around 20+ tools, such as Excel and SQL Database
data.para1: We strive to provide our students with a combination of theoretical, practical, and applied knowledge, and this is achieved through 350+ live sessions, 15 industry projects, and stimulated interviews to give them the advantage in real life. Additionally, students will have the chance to predict their credit default, gain knowledge of Google Mobility, understand Youtube video analytics, and more.

data.heading: Who can choose to do our data science course in Pune?
data.para: Our Data Science course is intended for learners from a variety of backgrounds and levels of expertise (graduates, post-graduates, intermediate students, freshers, and professionals) who wish to gain knowledge in the field of data science. The broad range of participants we invite enhances the sessions' discussions and interactions.

data.heading: What are the course program options offered in the data science course in Pune?
data.para: At Skillslash, we offer our course options ( advanced data science and AI course, Business Analytics for professionals ) currently under two program payment plans namely the Pro and the Pro Max
list: The Pro plan with a cost of INR 65,000 (without GST) gives you a 1 year live class subscription and a 2 year subscription to our Learning Management system dashboard, accompanied with 7+ industry projects and 1 capstone project.

The Pro Max plan o the other hand, at a cost of INR 1,20,000 (without GST) comes with job assistance, 4 year live class subscription, lifetime access to our learning dashboard, unlimited job referrals, 15+ industry projects, 3 capstone projects, 2 domain training, 6 months project certification from companies and a microsoft certification.

data.heading: How is the Job opportunities spectrum after completion of a data science course in Pune?
data.para: Following a successful data science course, graduates can look forward to a variety of job opportunities in Pune. As Pune has become a hub for technology and analytics, there has been a surge in the demand for experienced data scientists in various industries. Companies are increasingly relying on data-driven decisions to inform their business strategies, and this has led to an increased demand for data scientists. Professionals in the field of data science can find employment in a variety of industries, such as financial institutions, start-up companies, healthcare, manufacturing, and e-commerce.
list: Data Scientist and Data Analyst to,
Machine Learning Engineer and Business Analys
as well as AI Engineer and Data Engineer, as well as Research Analyst.
data.para1: Pune's vibrant start-up scene provides data scientists with the opportunity to get involved in cutting-edge projects that are new and exciting. Start-ups offer a fun and fast-paced atmosphere that encourages people to experiment and learn

data.heading: Is there scope for data scientists in India  in 2023?
data.para: Yes, the scope for data science and data scientists is booming in the current times. The demand for Data Science courses in India is on the rise, as both individuals and employers are recognizing the importance of having Data Science skills in order to remain competitive in the current job market. With India's transformation into a data-driven economy, the demand for Data Science specialists is expected to grow significantly.
data.para1: According to a report by the Data Science Recruitment Agency Nasscom and the Social Media Platform Zynga, the number of Jobs related to Data Science in India is expected to rise to 16,500 by 2025, from 2,720 Jobs in 2018. To meet this demand, various courses in Data Science are available in schools, online platforms, and training centers, which cover various aspects of the field, such as data analysis, machine learning, artificial intelligence, and data visualization. As India is on its way to becoming a Data-based economy, there are numerous opportunities for individuals to pursue a successful career in the Data Science field.

FAQ.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.desc: Go through the FAQs to know more about our Data Science course in Pune .

FaqDATA.ques: How to enroll for the data science course in Pune?
FaqDATA.ans: Check out our website to sign up for our Data Science training by contacting the institute directly for further details on the application process and paying online with our payment options. Once you've paid, you'll get an email with your payment details.

FaqDATA.ques: Does this data science course in pune have any requirements?
FaqDATA.ans: The data science course in Pune does not have any prior need or requirements criteria for one to enroll themselves. A basic technical knowledge is appreciated by our applicants, but people from all backgrounds and all levels of experiences are welcome to apply to this data science course in Pune.

FaqDATA.ques: As a fresher, can I enroll in the data science course in Pune ?
FaqDATA.ans: Yes, this data science course is open to all levels of experience and backgrounds. This course provides everything from scratch to help get you introduced to the data science world, and create your data science career.

FaqDATA.ques: What is the data science course duration in Pune ?
FaqDATA.ans: Our data science course subscriptions last from 1 year with the Pro plan and up to 3 years with the Pro Max plan and you can grab a lifetime access with our Pro Max plan.

FaqDATA.ques: What's in store for me in my Data science course in Pune?
FaqDATA.ans: In our Data Science course in Pune, you'll learn the ins and outs of data cleaning, data analysis, machine learning algorithms, natural language processing, computer vision and how to create AI-powered applications. Plus, you will be getting an opportunity to work on actual real-time projects, and earn a Microsoft and real-time work experience certification to add to your resume. While also offering guaranteed job referrals to our students to help them get placed and work on their career in data science.

FaqDATA.ques: What are the companies to look into that hire data science professionals ?
FaqDATA.ans: Many companies from big MNCs to recent startups and corporate companies hire data science professionals, which include: Google, Amazon, Microsoft, Facebook, Apple, IBM, Netflix, Uber, Airbnb, LinkedIn, Twitter, Salesforce, Adobe and more .

FaqDATA.ques: What would be the average salary of a data scientist in the city of Pune?
FaqDATA.ans: If you're looking for a Data Scientist job in Pune, Glassdoor says that the average salary in Pune for a Data Scientist is Rs. 1,049,000 per year.

FaqDATA.ques: Are there any fee discounts available for Data Science training in Pune ?
FaqDATA.ans: Yes, we offer fee discounts for our Data Science training in Pune. Eligible students can save up to 30% on their data science course fees based on the results of their aptitude test.

FaqDATA.ques: Can the data science course in Pune be customized ?
FaqDATA.ans: Through our Build Your Own Course (BYOC) program, students and our experts can collaborate to create a personalized learning program that suits the best interests .

FaqDATA.ques: What is data science, and Why is it in high demand?
FaqDATA.ans: Data science is a multidisciplinary discipline that focuses on the extraction of information and insights from data through the utilization of statistical methods, machine learning algorithms, and data visualizations. This discipline is highly sought after as companies increasingly rely on decision-making based on data to gain an advantage over competitors, resulting in an increase in the number of data science jobs.

FaqDATA.ques: How to enroll for the data science course in Pune?
FaqDATA.ans: Check out our website to sign up for our Data Science training
FaqDATA.ansAfter: or by contacting the institute directly for further details on the application process and paying online with our payment options. Once you've paid, you'll get an email with your payment details

FaqDATA.ques: Do you provide any placement assistance ?
FaqDATA.ans: After completing your course at Skillslash, you will receive an opportunity to work on live projects from companies and receive a certification for the same and further we also provide job referrals to help you score a placement of your choice.

FaqDATA.ques: Does the course include any hands-on project work?
FaqDATA.ans: Yes, our course in data science in Pune includes real-life projects to give you hands-on experience. By working on real-life projects, you'll be able to apply the ideas you've learned and create a portfolio to show off to potential employers

FaqDATA.ques: Can working professionals enroll in this data science course in Pune?
FaqDATA.ans: Our Pune-based data science course provides flexible scheduling and self paced learning to meet the needs of working professionals.

FaqDATA.ques: What tools and software will be taught during the data science courses?
FaqDATA.ans: Courses typically focus on the use of Python programming languages, R programming languages, SQL programming languages and libraries such as NumPy, Pandas, and scikit-learn.

FaqDATA.ques: How to become a data scientist?
FaqDATA.ans: If you want to be a data scientist, here's what you need to do: 1) Get a good grounding in math, stats, and programming like Python or R2. 3) Learn how to manipulate data, visualize it, and use machine learning algorithms. 4) Get hands-on experience by working on your own projects, competing in data science contests, or applying for internships. 5) Show off your skills by creating a portfolio and networking with other data scientists. 6) Keep up with the latest developments in data science to stay ahead of the curve

FaqDATA.ques: Do I need a technical or programming background to opt for this data science course in Pune?
FaqDATA.ans: This data science course in Pune is created to help learners from all levels, and multiple backgrounds. Having a background technical knowledge is advantageous but it is not a necessary requirement as we cover everything from the basics.

FaqDATA.ques: What are the topics covered in the data science course in Pune?
FaqDATA.ans: This data science course in Pune covers all the areas from basics to advanced data science tools and their applications. The data science course in Pune covers basic programming of Python, applied statistics, machine learning, NLP, deep learning, Data science tools, Power BI and everything one needs to know to succeed as a data scientist.
